text: kya tumamen se koee chaahega ki usake khajoor tatha angooron ke baag hon, jinamen naharen bah rahee hon, unamen usake lie pratyek prakaar ke phal hon tatha vah boodha ho gaya ho aur usake nirbal bachche hon, phir vah bagol ke aaghaat se jisamen aag ho, jhulas jaaye.[1] isee prakaar allaah tumhaare lie aayaten ujaagar karata hai, taaki tum soch vichaar karo
